Wolverine Reintroduction: This project aimed to find potential suitable area for wolverine reintroduction in Colorado, specifically in the Steamboat Springs/Yampa area. This work was done on ArcGIS Pro and utilized many public datasets on criteria like elevation, snowpack, and public lands.

Deforestation Article: This article was written with the intent of having a general audience. It is based on an actual study done by Callum Smith at the University of Leeds in the UK to find a correlation between rainfall and deforestation. This article explains their methods and results while also providing background on deforestation itself.
